text: Kate Middleton, 36, has given birth to three children since marrying Prince William, 36, and becoming a member of the Royal Family. Being a normal girl from Berkshire, the former fashion and marketing professional had to adapt to royal life. When she did fall pregnant, Kate was not allowed to have one baby tradition other mothers in the UK will experience, a baby shower. Another royal baby is now on the way, with Meghan Markle having her first child with husband Prince Harry. With Meghan now pregnant, and hailing from the US where baby showers are the norm, will Meghan be allowed what Kate wasn â€™ t? Kate Middleton : The pregnancy tradition Kate was not allowed to have - will Meghan be? Baby showers are a way for the expectant mother and those close to her to celebrate the pregnancy and upcoming
